subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: There is no good time for Stephon Marbury to miss games. But this week ranks among the worst possible as the Knicks prepare for Wednesday's meeting with the Suns, who have the league’s second-best record.
snippet: There is no good time for Stephon Marbury to miss games. But this week ranks among the worst possible as the Knicks prepare for Wednesday's meeting with the Suns, who have the league’s second-best record.
